title: Bug 20093Double entries on Java project properties
description: Bug 20093Double entries on Java project properties
SR: build 20020612 (17:44)WinXPReproducable on both Japanese and German create new Java project choose Properties from the context menu from the Navigator view note all is ok choose Properties from the context menu in the Packages view note that there are 2 entries for "Java Build Path" and "Javadoc location"Also: add a project reference in one of the Java Build Path entries hit OK go back in and see that the project reference is not longer there.
